text: Halvard Magne Kausland (25 April 1945 - 21 December 2017) was a Norwegian jazz guitarist, composer and civil servant. He was born in Sund, Sotra, Norway. Kausland was also a well-known jazz guitarist, having played in the band of Ole Paus among other things. Kausland had been appointed as acting director of the Arts Council Norway from 1 November 1996 to 31 March 2000. From 1966 to 1979 he was married to Grethe Kausland. Kausland died of thyroid cancer in Oslo on 21 December 2017 at the age of 72.Halvard Magne Kausland ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from thyroid cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Norway Category:Norwegian jazz musicians Category:Norwegian guitarists
